main_caption.message: Sync Code Place with your Github.

github_auth_request.message: Authenticate Github to use Code Place Hub.

connect_repo_info.message: Connect your Github repository to Code Place Hub.

repo_create_success.message: Successfully created and linked your Github repository!

repo_unlink_success.message: Successfully unlinked your current Github repository! Please create/link a new repository.

recommend_refresh.message: If you're on the Code Place page, refresh the Code Place page to activate the extension.

toast_disabled.message: Code Place Hub is disabled. Skipping upload.

toast_incomplete_setup.message: Code Place Hub setup incomplete. Open the extension and finish setup.

toast_ready_upload.message: Your code will be uploaded to Github when it's accepted.

toast_processing_upload.message: Uploading your code to Github, Please wait...

toast_successful_upload.message: Your code has been uploaded to Github.

toast_duplicate_upload.message: Your code has already been submitted.

error_improper_auth.message: Code Place Hub is not authorized to access your Github account. Please click `Authenticate` in the extension to authorize it.

error_no_option_selected.message: No option selected, Please pick an option from the dropdown menu below.

error_no_repo_name.message: No repository name provided, Please provide a name for your repository.

error_unable_to_modify_repo.message: Unable to modify the repository. Try again later.

error_bad_request.message: Bad POST request. Make sure you're not overriding any existing scripts.

error_unauthorized_access_to_repo.message: Unauthorized access to the repository. Try again later.

error_forbidden_access_to_repo.message: Forbidden access to the repository. Try again later.

error_unprocessable_entity.message: Unprocessable entity. Repository may have already been created. Tryn linking instead.

error_moved_permanently.message: This repository has been moved permanently. Try creating a new one.

error_repo_not_found.message: Repository not found. Make sure the repository name is correct.
